item.title: Hello, World!
item.author: patrick.bucher@mailbox.org (Patrick Bucher)
item.description: Hi there. This is my new blog. I’m trying out Hugo and rather produce something real, which causes me real problems to solve. On this blog, I’d like to document the progress of various things I’m learning this year. The goal is to publish useful information rather than keeping a journal for self-castigation when I’m not doing anything useful. Topics So here’s what my readers can expect (German speaking readers can also refer to my 2024 Ideas post on my main website):
